availability.p: Published under a Creative Commons Attribution ShareAlike 3.0 License

div.head: Description of changes for 2011.10
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft created from a comparision of the reims and vatican manuscripts. Corrections and additions will be made after the completion Sorbonne and St. Victor transcriptions and a collation comparison. A intitial apparatus has been constructed, but it also needs to be corrected and updated when the Sorbonne and St. Victor transcriptions are complete. Name and title refs have been added. Difficult transcriptions have been marked as unclear. Place holders for some cross references have been addedd,d, bbut the link still needs to be made. Likewise, other citation information still needs to be added.
